author: holiman
content:
Geth seems to be having some issues still: 
```
--- FAIL: TestBlockchain (1.07s)
    --- FAIL: TestBlockchain/InvalidBlocks/bcUncleHeaderValidity/gasLimitTooLowExactBound.json (0.05s)
        --- FAIL: TestBlockchain/InvalidBlocks/bcUncleHeaderValidity/gasLimitTooLowExactBound.json/gasLimitTooLowExactBound_London (0.01s)
            block_test.go:51: test without snapshotter failed: block #3 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 3141588, want 3144658 +-= 3069
            block_test.go:54: test with snapshotter failed: block #3 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 3141588, want 3144658 +-= 3069
    --- FAIL: TestBlockchain/InvalidBlocks/bcEIP1559/gasLimit20m.json (0.01s)
        block_test.go:51: test without snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 19980469, want 20000000 +-= 19530
        block_test.go:54: test with snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 19980469, want 20000000 +-= 19530
    --- FAIL: TestBlockchain/InvalidBlocks/bcEIP1559/badBlocks.json (0.01s)
        block_test.go:51: test without snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 1072693248, want 1073741824 +-= 1048575
        block_test.go:54: test with snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 1072693248, want 1073741824 +-= 1048575
    --- FAIL: TestBlockchain/InvalidBlocks/bcEIP1559/gasLimit40m.json (0.01s)
        block_test.go:51: test without snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 39960938, want 40000000 +-= 39061
        block_test.go:54: test with snapshotter failed: block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 39960938, want 40000000 +-= 39061
```
The `BerlinToLondonTransition` seems fixed though
Investigating...

author: holiman
content: Github seems partially down, hence why I posted here instead of on the ticket

author: holiman
content: I think the lower bound is miscalculated by retesteth, it has an off-by-one

author: holiman
content: The `block #2 insertion into chain failed: invalid gas limit: have 19980469, want 20000000 +-= 19530` -- so retesteth thinks `19980469` is ok, geth thinks `19980470` is the lowest allowed

author: holiman
content:
From EIP
```
assert block.gas_limit > parent_gas_limit - parent_gas_limit // 1024, 'invalid block: gas limit decreased too much'
```

author: holiman
content: So `block.gas_limit` must be greater than `19980469`

author: holiman
content: This logic was changed, as part of https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3566
